summary: First full E2E test completed. All 25 backend API tests passed (100%). All frontend screens load and function correctly. Core CRUD flows verified for auth, expos, exhibitors, shortlists, expo days, and admin features.

minor.issue: JWT key is 26 bytes (below recommended 32 bytes for SHA256)
minor.note: Non-breaking warning in logs but should be fixed for production

integration_issues.issue: Console shows '520 server error' warnings but app functions normally
integration_issues.note: Likely related to Expo dev server CORS or proxy - not affecting functionality

react_native_issues.note: Non-breaking deprecation warnings that should be addressed

action_items: Consider increasing JWT_SECRET to 32+ bytes for production deployment
Update deprecated React Native props (pointerEvents, Image resizeMode) when time permits
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ All environment variables properly configured (EXPO_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL, MONGO_URL, DB_NAME)
✓ MongoDB _id excluded correctly via projection in all queries
✓ All API endpoints use /api prefix as required
✓ JWT authentication working correctly with Bearer tokens
✓ React Native components used properly (View, Text, TouchableOpacity, etc.)
✓ testID attributes present on interactive elements
✓ Error handling implemented for API calls
✓ Mobile-first design implemented with proper spacing and touch targets
seed_data_creation: Seed data already exists via POST /api/seed endpoint (2 expos, 8 exhibitors, 2 users: demo@expointel.com and admin@expointel.com)
context_for_next_testing_agent: First comprehensive E2E test completed successfully. All core features working: login/auth, expo browsing, exhibitor filtering, profile viewing, shortlist management, expo day timeline, and admin CSV upload UI. Backend API fully tested with pytest suite. Minor non-breaking warnings noted but no functionality issues found.

backend_test_summary.seed: PASS - /api/seed creates demo data or returns already_seeded

auth.register: PASS - creates user and returns token
auth.get_me: PASS - returns user info with valid token

shortlists.get: PASS - returns user shortlists with exhibitors populated

expodays.add_meeting: PASS - adds meeting with time and agenda
expodays.get: PASS - returns expo days with populated exhibitor data

login_screen.login_flow: PASS - successfully logs in with demo@expointel.com

home_screen.loads_after_login: PASS - navigates to home after successful login
home_screen.expo_selector: PASS - opens modal with expo list
home_screen.exhibitor_list: PASS - displays 8 exhibitor cards with company, HQ, revenue, team, booth
home_screen.filter_chips: PASS - revenue and industry filters visible and functional

exhibitor_profile.opens: PASS - clicking Profile button opens detail screen
exhibitor_profile.displays_data: PASS - shows company name, stats, solutions, industry, HQ
exhibitor_profile.navigation: PASS - back button returns to home

shortlists_tab.loads: PASS - shows existing shortlists from tests
shortlists_tab.add_modal: PASS - shortlist modal opens from home screen

expoday_tab.loads: PASS - shows expo selector and empty state message
